long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BrowseBuddy – Track Your Browsing Time & Set Daily Limits for Websites

Take charge of your online time with BrowseBuddy, the simple Chrome extension that tracks your web activity and helps you set daily limits to maintain focus and productivity. Whether you’re looking to reduce distractions, boost efficiency, or manage your screen time, BrowseBuddy is here to help.

Key Features:

	•	DailyView: Instantly see how much time you’ve spent on websites today.
	•	MonthlyView: Track your average daily browsing time over the last month for insights into long-term patterns.
	•	SetDailyLimit: Set daily time limits for specific websites, ensuring you stay within your desired browsing goals.

Stay productive, minimize distractions, and make the most of your time online with BrowseBuddy’s intuitive interface and real-time tracking.
